creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: standing male figure looking to PL; hands held low and together holding a shield, decorated with the face of a lion, that is resting on the ground; all on base; sword in the crook of his PL arm; figure wearing a red hat with brim and earflaps and glazed orange uniform with brown sleeves, "skirt" and boots; green pigment traces on front of tie
title: Warrior holding lion mask shield
